name: No Home in their Eyes
description:
"No home in their eyes" is a narrative game, following a day in the life of Juliet, a transgender woman.

The main focus of this game is the overwhelming omnipresence of prejudice in our society, be it conscious or not.

The game is played by pointing and clicking, to go throught dialogues.
The E key is used to start a dialogue when close to a character.

Made for the Global Game Jam 2019, in 48 hours, using construct 2.
